record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H. RES. 106
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H. RES. 106 -- (House of Representatives - October 15, 2007)

[Page: H11533]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I request unanimous consent that my name be removed as a cosponsor of H. Res. 106.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from California?
